00010 static void CopyGreyScaleBytesToFIBitmap(FIBITMAP *src, char *data, int padded)
00011 {
00012         register int y;
00013 
00014         int data_line_length, height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00015         
00016         if(padded)
00017                 data_line_length = FreeImage_GetPitch(src);
00018         else
00019                 data_line_length = FreeImage_GetLine(src);
00020         
00021         char *bits;
00022         char *data_row;
00023                         
00024         for( y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00025 
00026                 bits = (char *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y);
00027 
00028                 data_row = data + (height - y - 1) * data_line_length;
00029 
00030                 memcpy( bits, data_row, data_line_length ); 
00031         }
00032 }
00033 
00034 static void CopyColourBytesToFIBitmap(FIBITMAP *src, char *data, int padded)
00035 {
00036         register int x, y;
00037 
00038         int data_line_length;
00039         int height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00040         int width = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00041 
00042         if(padded)
00043                 data_line_length = FreeImage_GetPitch(src);
00044         else
00045                 data_line_length = FreeImage_GetLine(src);
00046         
00047         // Calculate the number of bytes per pixel (3 for 24-bit or 4 for 32-bit) 
00048         int bytespp = FreeImage_GetLine(src) / width; 
00049 
00050         char *bits;
00051         char *data_row;
00052                         
00053         for( y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00054 
00055                 bits = (char *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y);
00056 
00057                 data_row = (char *) data + (height - y - 1) * data_line_length;
00058 
00059                 for( x = 0; x < width; x++) {
00060                                 
00061                         bits[FI_RGBA_RED] = data_row[0];
00062                         bits[FI_RGBA_GREEN] = data_row[1];
00063                         bits[FI_RGBA_BLUE] = data_row[2];
00064 
00065                         if(bytespp == 4)
00066                                 bits[FI_RGBA_ALPHA] = data_row[3];
00067 
00068                         // jump to next pixel
00069                         bits += bytespp;
00070                         data_row += bytespp;
00071                 }
00072         }
00073 }
00074 
00075 void DLL_CALLCONV
00076 FreeImageAlgorithms_CopyBytesToFBitmap(FIBITMAP *src, char *data, int padded)
00077 {
00078         FREE_IMAGE_TYPE type = FreeImage_GetImageType(src);
00079         int bpp = FreeImage_GetBPP(src);
00080 
00081         switch(bpp)
00082         {
00083                 case 8:
00084                 case 16:
00085                         CopyGreyScaleBytesToFIBitmap(src, data, padded);
00086                         break;
00087 
00088                 case 24:
00089                         CopyColourBytesToFIBitmap(src, data, padded);   
00090                         break;
00091 
00092                 case 32:
00093                 {
00094                         if(type == FIT_BITMAP)
00095                                 CopyColourBytesToFIBitmap(src, data, padded);
00096 
00097                         if(type == FIT_FLOAT)
00098                                 CopyGreyScaleBytesToFIBitmap(src, data, padded);
00099                         
00100                         break;
00101                 }
00102         }
00103 }

00106 FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV
00107 FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile(const char *pathname)
00108 {
00109         FREE_IMAGE_FORMAT fif = FIF_UNKNOWN; 
00110 
00111         // check the file signature and deduce its format 
00112         // (the second argument is currently not used by FreeImage)     
00113         fif = FreeImage_GetFileType(pathname, 0);
00114                 
00115         if(fif == FIF_UNKNOWN) { 
00116                 // no signature ? // try to guess the file format from the file extension
00117                         
00118                 fif = FreeImage_GetFIFFromFilename(pathname);
00119         } // check that the plugin has reading capabilities ... 
00120                 
00121         if((fif != FIF_UNKNOWN) && FreeImage_FIFSupportsReading(fif)) { 
00122                 
00123                 // load the file
00124                 return FreeImage_Load(fif, pathname, 0); 
00125         }
00126 
00127         return NULL;
00128 }

00131 FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV
00132 FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadGreyScaleFIBFromArrayData (char *data, int bpp, int width, int height, FREE_IMAGE_TYPE data_type, int padded)
00133 {
00134         FIBITMAP        *dib;
00135         char            *data_ptr;
00136         
00137         // Check the data type and convert to bpp
00138         if ( bpp < 0 )
00139                 return NULL;
00140 
00141         data_ptr = data;
00142         
00143         switch (bpp)
00144         {
00145                 case 8:
00146                         
00147                         // Allocate a new dib
00148                         if ( (dib = FreeImage_Allocate (width, height, 8, 0, 0, 0)) == NULL )
00149                                 return NULL;
00150         
00151                         FreeImageAlgorithms_SetGreyLevelPalette(dib);
00152 
00153                         break;
00154                         
00155                 case 16:
00156                         
00157                         if(data_type == FIT_UINT16) {
00158                         
00159                                 if ( (dib = FreeImage_AllocateT(FIT_UINT16, width, height, 16, 0, 0, 0)) == NULL )
00160                                         return NULL;
00161                         }
00162                         
00163                         if(data_type == FIT_INT16) {
00164                         
00165                                 if ( (dib = FreeImage_AllocateT(FIT_INT16, width, height, 16, 0, 0, 0)) == NULL )
00166                                         return NULL;
00167                         }
00168                 
00169                         break;
00170                         
00171         
00172                 case 32:
00173                 
00174                         if(data_type == FIT_FLOAT) {
00175                         
00176                                 if ( (dib = FreeImage_AllocateT(FIT_FLOAT, width, height, 32, 0, 0, 0)) == NULL )
00177                                         return NULL;
00178                         }
00179                         else {
00180                         
00181                                 return NULL;
00182                         }
00183                         
00184                         break;
00185         }
00186 
00187         FreeImageAlgorithms_CopyBytesToFBitmap(dib, data, padded);
00188 
00189         return dib;
00190 }

00192 FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV
00193 FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadColourFIBFromArrayData (char *data, int bpp, int width, int height, int padded)
00194 {
00195         FIBITMAP        *dib;
00196         char            *data_ptr;
00197         
00198         // Check the data type and convert to bpp
00199         if ( bpp < 0 )
00200                 return NULL;
00201 
00202         data_ptr = data;
00203         
00204         switch (bpp)
00205         {
00206                 case 8:
00207                 case 16:
00208                         
00209                         return NULL;
00210                         
00211                 case 24:
00212                 
00213                         // Allocate a new dib
00214                         if ( (dib = FreeImage_AllocateT (FIT_BITMAP, width, height, 24, 0, 0, 0)) == NULL )
00215                                 return NULL;
00216                         
00217                         break;
00218                 
00219                 case 32:
00220                 
00221                         if ( (dib = FreeImage_Allocate (width, height, 32, 0, 0, 0)) == NULL )
00222                                         return NULL;
00223                         
00224                         break;
00225         }
00226 
00227         FreeImageAlgorithms_CopyBytesToFBitmap(dib, data, padded);
00228 
00229         return dib;
00230 }

00233 int DLL_CALLCONV
00234 FreeImageAlgorithms_SaveFIBToFile (FIBITMAP *dib, const char *filepath, FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SAVE_BITDEPTH bit_depth)
00235 {
00236         FIBITMAP *standard_dib, *converted_dib;
00237         FREE_IMAGE_FORMAT fif = FIF_UNKNOWN;
00238                 
00239         // try to guess the file format from the file extension
00240         fif = FreeImage_GetFIFFromFilename(filepath);
00241         
00242         // check that the plugin has writing capabilities ... 
00243         if((fif != FIF_UNKNOWN) && FreeImage_FIFSupportsWriting(fif)) { 
00244         
00245                 standard_dib = FreeImage_ConvertToStandardType(dib, 1);
00246 
00247                 if(bit_depth == BIT24)
00248                         converted_dib = FreeImage_ConvertTo24Bits(standard_dib);
00249                 else
00250                         converted_dib = FreeImage_ConvertTo8Bits(standard_dib);
00251 
00252                 assert(converted_dib != NULL);
00253 
00254                 if(!FreeImage_Save(fif, converted_dib, filepath, 0)) {
00255                         FreeImageAlgorithms_SendOutputMessage("Unknown Error Saving File! FreeImage_Save Failed");
00256                         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00257                 }
00258 
00259                 FreeImage_Unload(standard_dib); 
00260                 FreeImage_Unload(converted_dib); 
00261         }
00262         else {
00263         
00264                 FreeImageAlgorithms_SendOutputMessage("Error Saving File! Unsupported Type");
00265                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00266         }
00267         
00268         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00269 }
